intents.diagnosis: Time sync or token seed mismatch is preventing OTP generation.
actions: Ensure device time is set to automatic
Re-sync the token in the Authenticator app
Try a new OTP after 30 seconds

intents.diagnosis: Push approval is timing out due to notification or network delays.
actions: Confirm push notifications are enabled for the app
Switch to Wi-Fi or stable network
Retry approval within the next 60 seconds

intents.diagnosis: Passkey registration failed due to device or policy constraints.
actions: Ensure device screen lock is enabled
Retry passkey registration in the same browser
Check that the device is not in restricted mode

intents.diagnosis: Biometric attempts exceeded or sensor is temporarily locked.
actions: Use device PIN once to re-enable biometrics

intents.diagnosis: Backend or IdP is unreachable from this device.
actions: Disable VPN or proxy and retry
Try again from a different network

intents.diagnosis: App configuration or policy mismatch detected.
actions: Verify the correct environment is selected
Update the app to the latest version
Re-enroll the device if configuration changed
